channel.title: Ardor - Designed For Maximum Enjoyment
channel.description:
[SIZE=3][FONT=Arial][COLOR=#FFD700][CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/jcuAn/2ece8bc76f.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Media] Change your title by clicking your name [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6eEI9No.png[/img]
Construction During Development [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/feMOwOD.png[/img]
Working Curses(can also change your skin colour by speaking to Make Over Mage) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/55P01jR.png[/img]
Party Room [img]http://i.imgur.com/iwZl66B.png[/img]
Challenging Bosses [img]http://i.imgur.com/oa0JcNx.jpg[/img]
Exciting Training Areas [img]http://i.imgur.com/lE1einV.jpg[/img]
Slayer Interface [img]http://i.imgur.com/mTciAbH.png[/img]
[/SPOILER]
[SIZE=5]EXCLUSIVE MOPARSCAPE PROMO CODE[/SIZE]
We want you, members of Moparscape, to have an even bigger incentive to join us! Because of this, we've generated a special code just for you. You can redeem it by speaking to "Elena" at home. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rR4zbkX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xXS9h5k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dJPewke.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ar8VBR7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xjo5pkf.png[/img]
[COLOR=#008000][SIZE=5]The code is: moparscape [/SIZE][/COLOR] This will give you a unique title as well as a dragonkin lamp to get you started, and a unique pet!
[SIZE=6][URL=http://"http://ardorps.com/Ardor.jar"][COLOR=#ff0000]Play Now[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE][/CENTER]
All the best, Ardor Management

hate to break it to ya bud, but vagina was actually designed for maximum enjoyment.

item.title: Ardor - Designed For Maximum Enjoyment
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Many thanks for everyones kind words of support!

Our dedicated team of developers are constantly trying to raise the standard of RSPS and raise the expectations that players have about RSPS, and we do this by trying to produce unique and well coded content.

This week we’re going to be bug busting and after that we’ll be back to working on content!

All the best,
Harry

Read full topic

item.title: Ardor - Designed For Maximum Enjoyment
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I have been playing this server recently in my past time when I am not programming/messing around on my local server. Great developers I know most of them already from Rune-Server/prior experiences. Very knowledgable team and they are always adding new content.

If you want a good community, actual competent programmers to make content for you to play, and overall a great server check these guys out. For those of you who know me I tend to report stuff in a large bulk. Within a week these guys had most of my bugs repaired.

Read full topic

item.title: Ardor - Designed For Maximum Enjoyment
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:12, topic:552645”]It’s not an opinion it’s just looking at it from a utilitarian point of view. It had to be done. But I see you added the media now so it’s alright.

Looking at your media and “features”, I don’t see anything special about this server. “Dicing” and “working bank pins” listed as features are actually laughable. Maybe if this was a Delta… Goodluck anyways.[/quote]

Did you just say maybe if this was a Delta? Are you serious? You’re saying this would be good if it was a Delta? I did use Delta, 5 or 6 years ago and then realized it was incredibly messy and unstable. As I remember, the commands are in Client.java? That alone makes me cringe.

If you don’t see anything special you’re not looking hard enough :L Promo Codes? Referral System? The THIRD 317 server to have Construction(tying in with Runique)

Dicing is a fun feature for our community to do, and bank pins is to show that we take great care regarding the security of our users.

All the best,
Harry
[/quote]

Wrong, what I was saying was that this is 2015. And unless you’re making a nostalgic based server then features you are flaunting are worthless. Your server is a very high revision server so it shouldn’t even be considered a feature. I am aware bank pins and dicing are somewhat relevant, but they are NOT features. Not in a server like yours. Again it’s 2015, your server is a modern server.

And promo codes + referral systems are not hard to implement. Infact I had it on my server… And it was a Czar…

Read full topic

item.title: Ardor - Designed For Maximum Enjoyment
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

It’s not an opinion it’s just looking at it from a utilitarian point of view. It had to be done. But I see you added the media now so it’s alright.

Looking at your media and “features”, I don’t see anything special about this server. “Dicing” and “working bank pins” listed as features are actually laughable. Maybe if this was a Delta… Goodluck anyways.

[/quote]

Did you just say maybe if this was a Delta? Are you serious? You’re saying this would be good if it was a Delta? I did use Delta, 5 or 6 years ago and then realized it was incredibly messy and unstable. As I remember, the commands are in Client.java? That alone makes me cringe.

If you don’t see anything special you’re not looking hard enough :L Promo Codes? Referral System? The THIRD 317 server to have Construction(tying in with Runique)

Dicing is a fun feature for our community to do, and bank pins is to show that we take great care regarding the security of our users.

All the best,
Harry

Read full topic

item.title: Ardor - Designed For Maximum Enjoyment
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:6, topic:552645”][quote author=Welliton_inc link=topic=671561.msg4490964#msg4490964 date=1437914969]

Thread fixed.

Please let me know if you can’t see the layout as there is some media in the layout.

by layout are you talking about those bullet holes on your first picture? If so I can hardly see the actual image as it is behind a text. There needs to be ALOT more media.
[/quote]

That’s your opinion.
Personally I feel too much media just makes a thread look ugly. You should provide a minimal amount so that people come online to see the rest.

I will however add a few more pictures.[/quote]

It’s not an opinion it’s just looking at it from a utilitarian point of view. It had to be done. But I see you added the media now so it’s alright.

Looking at your media and “features”, I don’t see anything special about this server. “Dicing” and “working bank pins” listed as features are actually laughable. Maybe if this was a Delta… Goodluck anyways.

Read full topic

You evidently haven’t checked the post :L

@Sarwar, thank you sir.
